data.message:
Well now then Mr M. Mathers you’ve certainly made our day
Up rooting yourself and travelling all the way from the USA
Yorkshire folk here are so friendly - our crowds will be the best
Trust me you won’t be disappointed here at 2017 LEEDS FEST.
I can’t believe you chose our vibrant city LEEDS to entertain
Must mean Marshall our crowds have made you come back again?
You’re giving up so much of your time so I’m doing just that too
Penning this rhyme purely for you as a huge THANK YOU
Back to the Fest - I’ll probably be the oldest clubber having fun
Our kids love all your music and film work that you have done
We’ve been avid admirers since 1997 - Slim Shady
You was writing in the spring and I was busy having my baby!
Who by the way is our second child our beautiful Princess Millie
We’ll be at the front in the August sun at least it won’t be chilly
My youngest son is 14 and knows all your songs word for word 
I ask him to turn it down in the car - he looks at me as if I’m absurd
After all the kids can’t listen who are coming out of junior school
Although I know that plenty of the mums will dreamily drool
You’ll be the last but no means the least act on Bank Holiday Sunday
So see ya there where you’ll bring the house down in your own way.
THANK YOU
XXXXX
